definitions: To reduce (something) to small particles or powder by crushing it.
To sharpen, smooth, or polish (something) with a grinding action.
To rub together or against something with a harsh, grating sound.
To operate or be operated with a grinding noise.
To work or study hard and steadily.
examples: They grind coffee beans every morning.
He needs to grind the axe.
Her teeth grind when she's stressed.
The system grinds down the poor.
